about_the_game:
In "Redial: Conundrum," our protagonist is an esteemed investigator working for the Federal Bureau of Investigation. Investigating the disappearance of his best friends daughter. Tasked with uncovering hidden truths, he embarks on a dangerous mission to reveal the secrets behind a clandestine laboratory tucked away in a remote town in Alaska.
As the story unfolds, the investigator delves into a world of intrigue, mystery, and secrecy. The lab he investigates is shrouded in darkness, hidden away from prying eyes and shielded from public knowledge. Rumors suggest that the lab conducts unethical experiments and conceals valuable information that could potentially impact society.
Driven by his determination and unwavering sense of justice, the investigator infiltrates the lab's heavily guarded premises. He encounters an array of obstacles, including sophisticated security systems, ruthless guards, and perplexing puzzles designed to protect the lab's secrets.
With each step forward, the investigator uncovers fragments of the truth, slowly piecing together the lab's hidden agenda. He unearths shocking revelations about forbidden experiments involving advanced technologies, genetic manipulation, or potentially dangerous weaponry.
As the investigation progresses, the investigator's resolve is tested, and he finds himself questioning his own allegiances and the cost of unearthing the truth. Utilize your weapons wisely to defend yourself from hostile forces and uncover the town's well-guarded secrets.

⦁ Investigate various locations in the village, including houses ,underground facilities a police station & lab.

⦁ Use your detective skills and limited resources to survive.

⦁ Solve puzzles to access areas and collect and use items and gather evidence and proofs.

⦁ Armed with an array of weapons and ammunition to protect yourself.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, killing and corpses with weapons in use with gameplay interact and environment. NOT extremely violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is expected to run at 1080p/30 FPS

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM

short_description: Investigator risks it all to a uncovers fragments of the truth in Alaska linked to his best friend's missing daughter. Encountering security hurdles and dark secrets, he unearths forbidden and shocking revelations. Armed and determined, he aims to unveil the truth hidden in a perilous town.
